meanings.definition: A supporter of the former Russian monarchy.
meanings.sent1: The tzarists gathered to honor the traditions of the old monarchy.
meanings.sent2: Many tzarists long for the return of the Russian monarchy.
meanings.sent3: The tzarists jokingly debated who would be the best ruler in a modern monarchy.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the tzarists symbolized loyalty and tradition.
meanings.sent5: The group of tzarists proudly displayed their loyalty to the monarchy.

meanings.definition: Relating to the former Russian monarchy.
meanings.sent1: The tzarists artifacts were displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The architecture of the palace had a tzarists influence.
meanings.sent3: The tzarists-themed party was a hit among history enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a tzarists elegance that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a scene with a tzarists aesthetic.
